info.name: Role and Permission Management System - Complete Collection
info.description: Comprehensive API collection for RBAC system with user management, role assignment, and permission control. Includes all endpoints with examples.

response.name: Successful Login
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Login successful",
    "data": {
        "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...",
        "type": "Bearer",
        "id": 1,
        "username": "superadmin",
        "email": "superadmin@example.com",
        "firstName": "Super",
        "lastName": "Admin",
        "roles": ["SUPER_ADMIN"],
        "permissions": ["user.create", "user.read", "user.update", "user.delete", "role.create"],
        "dashboardModules": ["User Management", "Role Management", "Dashboard"],
        "dashboardModulesWithPermissions": {
            "User Management": ["user.create", "user.read", "user.update", "user.delete"],
            "Role Management": ["role.create", "role.read", "role.update", "role.delete"],
            "Dashboard": ["dashboard.view", "dashboard.admin"]
        }
    }
}

response.name: Get All Settings - Success
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Settings retrieved successfully",
    "data": {
        "settings": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "key": "store_name",
                "value": "My Online Store",
                "type": "string",
                "createdAt": "2024-01-01T10:00:00",
                "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T10:00:00",
                "createdBy": "superadmin",
                "updatedBy": "superadmin"
            }
        ],
        "currentPage": 0,
        "totalItems": 1,
        "totalPages": 1,
        "pageSize": 10,
        "hasNext": false,
        "hasPrevious": false
    }
}
